title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the SmartCompostBin project.

title: Design IoT Hardware Architecture
description: Design the hardware architecture for the SmartCompostBin, including sensors and actuators.

title: Develop Mobile Application Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the SmartCompostBin mobile application.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Design and develop the backend services for the SmartCompostBin application, including data processing and analysis.

title: Integrate IoT Hardware with Backend Services
description: Develop the software to connect and integrate the IoT hardware with the backend services.

title: Implement Notification System
description: Create and implement a notification system to alert users when the compost is ready.

title: Test and Validate System Functionality
description: Perform testing and validation on the SmartCompostBin system to ensure it meets requirements.
dependencies: Integrate IoT Hardware with Backend Services

title: Refine and Optimize Design
description: Refine and optimize the design of the SmartCompostBin based on user feedback and testing results.

title: Prepare Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the SmartCompostBin, including user manuals and developer guides.
